headline.print_headline: TLC Abandoning the 'Freak Show' to Find Some Heart
headline.main: TLC Abandoning the 'Freak Show' to Find Some Heart

docs.lead_paragraph: Stepping away from the stage after outlining TLC's future plans one recent morning, Marjorie Kaplan used the phrase "freak show" before anyone else could. It's an image the network chief wants TLC to stay away from.
docs.snippet: Stepping away from the stage after outlining TLC's future plans one recent morning, Marjorie Kaplan used the phrase "freak show" before anyone else could. It's an image the network chief wants TLC to stay away from.

headline.print_headline: Weight Watchers Founder Jean Nidetch Dies at Age 91
headline.main: Weight Watchers Founder Jean Nidetch Dies at Age 91

docs.lead_paragraph: A half-century after dropping 70 pounds and keeping them off, Weight Watchers founder Jean Nidetch made some allowances: Cokes in her fridge, Klondikes in her freezer, the occasional potato or extra piece of bread on her plate. But she never again touched the chocolate marshmallow cookies she called her ultimate weakness, the treat she'd stash in the hamper and eat by the boxful in the middle of the night, all the while praying she'd choke on her next bite.
docs.snippet: A half-century after dropping 70 pounds and keeping them off, Weight Watchers founder Jean Nidetch made some allowances: Cokes in her fridge, Klondikes in her freezer, the occasional potato or extra piece of bread on her plate. But she never again...

headline.print_headline: Weight Watchers Founder Jean Nidetch Dies at Age 91
headline.main: Weight Watchers Founder Jean Nidetch Dies at Age 91

docs.lead_paragraph: Jean Nidetch, a New York housewife who tackled her own obesity, then shared her guiding principles with others in meetings that became known as Weight Watchers, the most widely known company of its kind, died Wednesday. She was 91.
docs.snippet: Jean Nidetch, a New York housewife who tackled her own obesity, then shared her guiding principles with others in meetings that became known as Weight Watchers, the most widely known company of its kind, died Wednesday. She was 91.
